courses.description: Enhance your singing with advanced Hindustani vocal techniques for intermediate to advanced learners.

courses.description: Master the tabla with our comprehensive course covering all skill levels.

courses.description: Learn the art of raga improvisation with this course designed for all levels.

courses.title: Indian Classical Music Production

courses.title: Bhajan Composition Essentials
courses.description: Learn the essentials of bhajan composition to express your musical creativity.

courses.title: Bollywood Music Production
courses.description: Create compelling Bollywood music with our course designed for beginners to advanced users.

courses.title: Carnatic Music History
courses.description: Explore the rich history of Carnatic music from its origins to the present day.

courses.title: Classical Guitar Techniques
